webscript.description:
The body of the POST call should be something like: 
   {
       "emails":    [ "emailId@company1.com", "email2d@company2.com", ... ]
       "message":   "Custom welcome message."

       "source":          "website",
       "sourceUrl":       "http://www.alfresco.com/products/cloud",
       "ipAddress":       "100.100.100.100",
       "landingTime":     1321010076,
       "landingReferrer": "format TBD",
       "landingPage":     "format TBD",
       "landingKeywords": ["key1", "key2", "key3"],
       "utmSource":       "format TBD",
       "utmMedium":       "format TBD",
       "utmTerm":         "format TBD",
       "utmContent":      "format TBD",
       "utmCampaign":     "format TBD"
   }
Note that everything below source is required if source == "website". Otherwise they are optional. The response will look like: 
{
   "invalidEmails":
   [
      {
         "email": "emailId@company2.com",
         "failureReason": "INCORRECT_DOMAIN" | "USER_EXISTS"
      },
      ...
   ]
}
>
